sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
approaches someone
, mu pride bliže.

seg.quote: He opened the car door for her as she approached.
The dogs began to bark as if aware of our approach.

sense.def:
An approach to a place
je cesta ali pot, ki pelje k določenemu kraju.

Če človek
approaches someone about something
, prvič govori z nekom o neki stvari.

seg.quote: They had approached us about working with their party.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
approaches a situation or problem
, na neki način razmišlja o nekem položaju ali problemu ali pa ga tako obravnava.

seg.quote: Governments must approach the subject of disarmament in a new spirit.

sense.def:
An approach to a situation or problem
je način, kako o okoliščinah ali problemu razmišljamo ali ukrepamo.

seg.quote: We need a new approach to this problem.

sense.def:
Kadar prihodnji dogodek ali datum
approaches
ali kadar človek
approaches a future event or date
, ta postopoma prihaja bliže.

seg.quote: We are approaching the day of the race.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
approaches a particular level or state
, skoraj doseže tako raven ali stanje.

seg.quote: These rocket planes approached speeds of 4000 mph.
